title: DELETE /api/v1/symptoms/{id} â€“ Response
description: Response after deleting a symptom entry.

success.description: Indicates whether the delete operation was successful.

entryId.description: The unique identifier of the deleted symptom entry.

count.description: Number of symptom details that were deleted (always 0 for delete operations).

validationErrors.description: List of validation errors if any occurred during deletion.
